text: Viruses combining deletion of the 3a gene with mutations throughout the E gene were generated by digesting previously described plasmids pBAC-SARS-CoV-MA15-EΔ1, -EΔ2, -EΔ3, -EΔ4, -EΔ5, and -EΔ6 (75) and -E-PBM Ϫ and -E-PBM* (46) with BamHI and RsrII and cloning the fragments with mutations into a similarly digested pBAC-SARS-CoV-MA15-Δ3a plasmid.
